title: Kotoka International Airport to be changed to Accra International Airport
desc: The Majority Leader in Parliament, Mahama Ayariga, has announced the government’s plans to change the name of Kotoka International Airport.

title: Eleven enforcement officers remanded over alleged RM239,000 bribery in Bintulu
desc: BINTULU (Feb 3): Eleven enforcement officers were remanded by the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) Sarawak over allegations of soliciting and receiving bribes totalling RM239,000 in exchange for providing protection, refraining from intimidation, and assisting the affairs of several inmates. title: Ghana Reference Rate for February expected to decline to 14.58%
desc: The Ghana Reference Rate (GRR) for February 2026 is expected to decline to about 14.58 per cent, from the current rate of 15.68 per cent for January.
